description.p: AEVITAS: When allies are within the 10ft radius of this ritual, they are healed on your turn for 4d4 + 4 damage.
ARMARA: Non-allies are pushed out of the radius of this ritual which has a radius of 15ft. Creatures attacking the ritual have disadvantage on the attack.
BOOTES: This causes animals to age without killing them, shedding them of their resources within 15ft.
DISCIDIA: This ritual causes non-allies to take damage while they are within the radius of 15ft. The damage is 3d8 psychic when non-allies begin their turn inside the radius.

EVORSIO: This ritual will cause mass destruction, destroying aything within a 20ft radius over time. This ritual will not hurt players, however it will break anything constructed like buildings or natural terrain. The ritual destroys from top to bottom, taking 5 turns to empty out its entire sphere of influence.

HOROLOGIUM: This ritual makes machines work twice their normal speed, causing no additional age or wear. If a construct is inside this radius, they are considered hasted. This ritual has a 15ft radius.
LUCERNA: This ritual functions the same as locate creature or locate object, and the pedestal must be given an item along with the crystal in order to function.
OCTANS: This ritual allows fishing to be done automatically within a 20ft radius. As long as you are in the area, it will function.
VICIO: This ritual allows all creatures within 20ft the ability to increase all movement speed by 15ft, as well as double their high jump.

AEVITAS: This ritual causes a creature inside its 10ft radius to wither with disease. Every 10 minutes a creature spends inside the radius of this ritual, they will gain a level of exhaustion until death.
ARMARA: This ritual causes enemies to be hasted within the radius, which is 15ft.
BOOTES: This ritual instantly kills any animal or beast CR 2 and below within 15ft.
DISCIDIA: This ritual damages anything in its wake, dealing 4d4+4 psychic damage to any creature within 15ft every turn.
EVORSIO: This ritual works in opposition to its normal counterpart. The 20ft radius sphere of destructioninstead starts terraforming, and creating rock and stone from bottom to top in 5 turns.
HOROLOGIUM: This ritual completely freezes enemies in space and time if they are fully inside the 15ft radius. This will also halt all machines and preserve them in time.
LUCERNA: This ritual slows time during the night, causing those inside to experience everything twice as slow around them in a 10ft radius.
OCTANS: This ritual summons water in a 20ft radius sphere around the ritual pedestal instantly.
VICIO: This ritual gives enemies within its 20ft radius the effect of the slow spell.
Elemental Swap (2 charges): You can change the damage type of your next attack.
Elemental Swap (2 charges): This functions as the confusion spell on an enemy.

Elemental Swap (2 charges): This allows you to slam a star into the ground from the sky, dealing 3d8 radiant damage on a failed Dexterity save equal to your Astral Sorcerer DC. This has a radius of 20ft.

Elemental Swap (2 charges): You channel the cosmos close to you, creating a barrier that cannot allow projectiles to pass through until the end of your next turn. Melee attacks against you have disadvantage.
Elemental Swap (2 charges): This is a much bigger explosion than your blasting star, dealing 5d10 fire damage on a failed Dexterity save equal to your Astral Sorcerer DC. This has a radius of 30ft.
